issue.title: [GLib] Add binding of gandiva::FunctionRegistry and related things
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5486](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5486). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I'd like to add a support of gandiva::FunctionRegistry and the related things in gandiva-glib.

comments.body:
